website_summaries.verdict: You can’t beat the anti-vibration stability that comes with bolting this tablet mount to your seat, and it effortlessly adapts to grasp a wide variety of tablet brands and sizes.
pros: Easily and securely clasps 7 to 15 inch sized tablets
Spring-loaded feature makes it easy to remove tablet when you need it
cons: Bolting a tablet to the base of the passenger seat may be too much work for some users

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it broke...only 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 1 year and then the wheels started falling off. - The plastic base broke (probably because of road vibration over time - see attached picture) and there is no product support if you lose the rubber inserts that hold the grips (see picture). Customer support is responsive but they just told me that it only has a one year warranty and told me nothing about the replacement rubber stops. - You get what you pay for. Will probably buy something a little more expensive but hopefully more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wohleking , Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: I drive for Uber and needed something sturdy to hold my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I drive for Uber and needed something sturdy to hold my tablet. I recieved the stand early 😊 I called around to see if i could find someone to install it. I got lucky and a tire shop hooked me up and installed it in 15 mins! FOR FREE! It was that simple for them. The best part!? IT WORKS LIKE A CHARM AND STILL WORKING! Actually the man at the shop was very impressed with it!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Blatt

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough
customer_reviews.text: If you intend to connect this via the passenger chair then this is very poorly designed. Once you hook up the stand to the chair screw, per the directions, there is no way to slide the chair all the way up anymore! Basically whoever sits behind the passenger seat has no leg room because if you try to slide up the chair the stand gets in the way. Luckily I had a separate 3 ft long bendable neck for my ipad that I had to MacGiver with the metal base, but the manufacturer needs to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, quality material. It was moderately difficult to install on my vehicle, but I think that is vehicle-specific. I've used it to hold tablets, iPhone Plus, and a laptop without any problems or wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely fashion, always a plus. Its durable and easy to install. Comes with multiple pieces of mounting hardware so that you can install it elsewhere in case you do not want to bolt it to the seat. Which in my case is exactly what was needed. The product comes with all kinds of sizing attachments for the different sized tablets and or cell phones it is supposed to accommodate. All made out of durable materials it seems, does not feel cheap like some products. I am very pleased with this product and will not hesitate to purchase this item again should the need arise. I will definitely check out their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good as advertised. Only negative is there are limited options on the "tilt" so it reflects a lot of sunlight. It also has fixed brackets. They send several sizes, so you can use most tablets, but if it's oddly shaped, this may not hold it tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Keillor

customer_reviews.title: this was an excellent purchase. Materials and build quality were excellent
customer_reviews.text: A life saver. I got tired of my iPad sitting on my passenger seat, this was an excellent purchase. Materials and build quality were excellent, not another cheap plastic piece to put in. The clips that are included were my only gripe, they move around in their slot and I think they could have been designed better, but no significant complaints after months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bdock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I dont give out a 5 star very often BUT... Let me tell you this is No cheap madd Itemit tookme 5 min to install and I use it all night long
customer_reviews.author: Ed Roth

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, even on bumpy roads.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very quickly and in good condition. I was able to install the product quickly in my vehicle and after adjusting it to my needs have made great use of it for my Samsung Tab S2. It is very stiff and takes effort to adjust but the stiffness insures that it isn't going anywhere once it's where the buyer gets it where they want it. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a tablet mount for their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this mount
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this mount. It holds my tablet very securely, and I like how rigid it is. It's exactly what I needed to use my tablet as a GPS for work. I couldn't use the seat mounting bolts on either of my vehicles because it just wasn't feasible. I ended up using the other mounting bracket and found panels in my vehicles to mount it to instead.
customer_reviews.author: David Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these, as well as the windshield mounted ones for semi trucks, to hold the new electronic logs. The drivers are all very happy with the mounts, and as the fleet grows, I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I like the mount except for the fact that in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the mount except for the fact that in a Ford F150, attaching it to the seat track bolt makes it just v=barely long enough to be level with the seat. The gooseneck needs to be another 6 - 8 inches longer to be actually useful. If there was an extension for this product, I would need one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Doss

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet Mount to Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet/phone mount. The thing that I love about it is that it fit my Samsung Pro without me having to remove the protection case. It was very easy to install and it gives you multiple ways to install it in your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: JmanofASC

customer_reviews.title: Buy a hose medium sized hose clamp before installing. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I mounted it to the inside of my trk I tried to carefully adjust it. It broke with very little effort. I used a hose clamp to hold the broken part.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hays

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Does keep seat from going all the way to the forward position but is durable and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Handy product, just needs braced
customer_reviews.text: Started out good, however I will stabilize the next one better. Base broke on mine from the movement
customer_reviews.author: Doug Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Great holder
customer_reviews.text: They fit great in the trucks..used to hold tablets in Freightliners 2018-2020
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth jaquez

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and is functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome, easy fit, and perfect positioning. I have an older 4Runner without technology and this is great because it gives me a larger screen for navigation or gives my passenger the ability to watch Netflix on long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cattie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Strong! Holds my tablet and phone securely. We attached it to the passenger seat front bolt. It puts the screen within easy view of driver and yet is not distracting while driving- it doesn't block any lines of sight. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: that lisa girl

customer_reviews.title: Holds tablet really well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and holds my tablet really well. Good item
customer_reviews.author: Prepper Tenney

customer_reviews.title: meh, it's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay.. not great. I used it to mount a tablet near my ng wheel on my racing sim chair. It does tend to bounce and shake a bit more than I'd like it to. I will have to devise some kind of tripod like feet to stabilize it more.
customer_reviews.author: Gixerman

customer_reviews.title: Overall good if you dont have a thick case on tablet.
customer_reviews.text: It mounts a little shorter than expected. It is pretty sturdy. Tablet has thick shock proof case. Mounts are not quite deep enough to hold it well with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works goof at first, worthless after two months.
customer_reviews.text: Almost broke my laptop, feel on the floor. The product is not heat tempered, therefor it dry rots. Loved it at first, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great wish the the prongs were a bit longer to get a better bite on the bolt
customer_reviews.author: Ethan B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mobile Mount
customer_reviews.text: Best mobile mount I have purchased, easy to install and very sturdy. Very little shaking when driving. I am an Uber driver and I use the tablet to accept trips and also for navigation...this is perfect for keeping it visible and close so I can keep eyes on the road. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ValuesDirect2u

customer_reviews.title: works good for the smaller sized tablet
customer_reviews.text: works good for the smaller sized tablet, still has a little to much vibration and movement when driving for me, but best product out there that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great product with included options for all types of mounting ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product with included options for all types of mounting preferences. Only suggestion is to include a longer base bracket for seat bolts that are more recessed.
customer_reviews.author: bgrn583

customer_reviews.title: The holder can wiggle a little, but it's easily remedied by little ingenuity
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! The holder can wiggle a little, but it's easily remedied by little ingenuity... Good price compared to a jotto desk and it's easy to install. I would like to see the black hose cover be split as to place a power charger cord inside to charge the tablet while under extended use. A simple black wiretie at the top and a few wraps with the powercord around hose works too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy unit. Holds my Galaxy tab 2 really well. I use it in a semi.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mount, relatively stable
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad mount, relatively stable. It definitely does suffer some from vibration but works pretty well. Bought to use my tablet as a larger GPS screen and have ended up mostly using this to hold my old Garmin GPS.

customer_reviews.title: Well and duly impressed.

customer_reviews.title: but it's overall a great product!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and I love this mount. Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: would be nice to have some instructions because the package contains some ...

customer_reviews.text: This holds an 8" tablet in a rough commercial vehicle. Very sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to use. It makes my tablet easier to use. I take my tablet out of the mount multiple times a day and this works well.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the iPad gives you plenty of mounting options, very sturdy also

customer_reviews.title: Solid aluminum bar!
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold an iPad mini with the included mount. Had to rig it to fit. The bar is solid aluminum! Not a flexible gooseneck as I anticipated but it is pretty sturdy. It would be perfect for bending into shape once and not reshaping it again. Takes a certain amount of muscle to bend into place.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Solid and easy to install in my Lexus CT 200H. Holds my iPad well. It will "juggle if left freestanding. I just bent the stand so my iPad rest on my center console and all is good. Literally took me 2 minutes to install.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeps my work tablet pretty stable.a little short for my work van because I did not pay to much attention to the size of it but just mounted it a different way

customer_reviews.title: This is great for holding my tablet in my truck
customer_reviews.text: This is great for holding my tablet in my truck. I work from my truck and need to have everything in its place. I have a Galaxy S@ 9.7 and it fits just right. ME

And I would like the tabs to be shorter, even with the case on they stick past about 1/2". It holds my tablet firmly with minimal movement.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product ever. I love it. Flexible easy to install

I didn't pay attention when I ordered so it is a bit short for my truck. But this is totally my fault.. however it is a easy fix. Just have to use the floor mount instead of seat bolt mount.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this swivel cradle mount to attach to a Celestron Alt-Azimuth tripod to allow me to use a 10” Android tablet for live-viewing from a Canon DSLR camera. As I expected it worked out perfectly because the tripod has square aluminum legs. The only modification I had to do was drill two holes through the tripod leg. With a little imagination, this swivel mount can be used in many different applications. I’m extremely happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good buy. It serves its purpose and is much ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. It serves its purpose and is much more affordable than some other products out there. Durability may be an issue in the long term... There's 4 separate clips that slide into the connecting "pad" which mounts to the post. There's a sliding portion allowing it to accommodate larger tablets. Sooner or later I see it breaking. If the tablet stays in the mount I think it could last a very long time. You're also mounting to your seat frame bolts with a plastic fitting. All that said, if it last two years you could buy 4 and get 8 years use for the same price as other mounts on the market.

product_meta.title: Tablet Mount for Car, Hands-Free Robust Seat Rail Tablet car Holder for Apple iPad Mini iPad Air iPad Pro, Samsung Galaxy TAB A E S4 S3 (7-15" tablets) w/Anti-Vibration Gooseneck and Swivel Cradle
product_meta.description: Digitl tablet car mount features an innovative holder that adjusts to fit your Apple iPad PRO/Air or iPad mini tablet and comes with an 18" flexible robust aluminum pedestal that attaches to your car`s seat rail. Additional brackets are also included for semi-permanent floor mounting alternative if desired.
feature_bullets: New innovative, adjustable tablet vehicle mount holder fits your Apple iPad Pro (9.7/10.5/12.9), iPad Air, iPad Mini 5 4 3/Samsung Galaxy Tab A E 5 4 3 S2 S3 S4, LG G Pad F2, Yoga Tablet and All 7-15" tablets with or without a carrying case, skin or screen protector

Tablet car dashboard mount holder? Windshield car mount tablet holder ? These two solutions are no comparison for our newly innovative 18 inch flexible aluminum floor seat bolt car mount tablet holder that offers an optional dashboard tablet holder mount drill in bracket which will keep your tablet secure , stable and most importantly, safe while on the road.

Lightweight, robust and sturdy enough to accommodate your tablet use in the car (handsfree) for a perfect vehicle tablet mount holder solution. The car tablet mount installs directly to the passenger side seat rail. Simple install with all hardware included, allows for quick and hassle-free installation
Swivel ball connection for (360) degree rotation with tilt mechanism, is ideal for both portrait or landscape optimal hands-free viewing when utilizing GPS navigation, phone book, emails and more

Powerful tablet mount cradle grip holder with side gripping technology offers a one-handed quick release functionality, that fully protects your tablet, laptop or convertible PC while giving you quick access to your device and all ports while on the road. (perfect solution for becoming ELD compliant)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars339 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
